name: productive-youtube
description: Transform YouTube into a productivity tool - Block distractions and stay focused

scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-files && npm run fix-content-script
scripts.copy-files: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.copyFileSync('public/manifest.json','dist/manifest.json'); fs.mkdirSync('dist/icons',{recursive:true}); try{const iconFiles=['icon16.png','icon48.png','icon128.png']; iconFiles.forEach(f=>{if(fs.existsSync('public/icons/'+f)) fs.copyFileSync('public/icons/'+f,'dist/icons/'+f);}); fs.copyFileSync('dist/src/popup.html','dist/popup.html'); let html=fs.readFileSync('dist/popup.html','utf8'); html=html.replace('../popup.js','./popup.js').replace('../popup.css','./popup.css'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/popup.html',html); fs.rmSync('dist/src',{recursive:true});}catch(e){} console.log('Files copied successfully');"
scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r extension.zip dist/*
